data.text: @AquamarineAust Kia ora, We are working to support the NZ Govt. guidance around physical distancing by allocating seating to allow additional space around customers where possible on our domestic and international flights. More info can be found here 👉 https://t.co/gm9u08Apdh ^DS

entity.name: Apple unveils the 5G-enabled iPhone 12
entity.description: The tech company revealed its new iPhone 12 on Tuesday with access to 5G wireless networks during their online-only event on October 13. They also launched a new miniature version of its HomePod for managing electronics at home and playing music. Apple typically announces its new iPhones in September but the launch was delayed this year due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

data.text: @ranginui @temihinga @Te_Taipo @mahelona Kia ora, what a great question! Unfortunately, Airline tickets do not allow for spaces, macrons or hyphens in ticket name fields. So all customers that have any of these in their name, won't be able to include them in their ticket name. Hope that helps clarify! 😊 ^DS

urls.description: Check if your travel is impacted by these major events. To ensure you are viewing our most recent updates, you may need to refresh this page or clear your browser cookies and cache. We continue to receive an extremely high number of calls, messages, and emails, which is greatly affecting our response time. Thank you for your continued patience while you wait to connect with us. If you prefer to contact us via one of our messaging channels, we ask that you provide as much information as possible when
